context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level photography techniques and digital media literacy
context.additional_context: Learners assume manager/leader roles and study in smartphone-dominant limited-technology environments. Focuses on blended cognitive skill-promoting learning design.

learning_goals: Learners perform low-dimensional cognitive tasks (video viewing, reading materials) in online photography content with over 80% participation.
Learners apply higher-order thinking skills (critique, discussion) through collaborative activities (weekly forums, webinars) and provide at least two meaningful feedbacks.
Learners use self-directed learning materials to create a portfolio development plan and meet evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
